description:
This introductory course on cloth diapers is designed for parents, families, and all types of child care providers who wish to learn about the modern world of cloth diapers.

This course will cover:

~The benefits of using cloth diapers (Cloth diapers can save you thousands a year!)
~The details on how to store and wash dirty diapers. (Lets talk poop)
~The different types of cloth diapers students will in encounter when shopping for cloth.

This course is designed with a balance of videos and text material that will help students become confident with using cloth diapers. The information presented in this course will aid students in purchasing cloth diapers as well as how to keep them clean while using them on small children. For all those who are interested in cloth diapers, this is the course for you! You do not need any prior knowledge on cloth diapers to enjoy this course and to effectively learn about this method of diapering your child.
title: An Introduction to Cloth Diapering
